description:
Saburo-senpai drops by to visit... with a frog of his own, Kululu.  Beware the genius with a malicious sense of humor and a gun that can make people change age!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kururu, un fin stratège / Le rajeunisseur
Natsumi Koi no Yukute ni Kuru Kururu de Arimasu / Hinata Aki Dynamite na Onna de Arimasu
夏美恋の行く手に来るクルル であります / 日向 秋ダイナマイトな女 であります
